channel.title: 2ndamendment on Ross A. Baker
channel.description: Recent content in 2ndamendment on Ross A. Baker

item.description: You can carry a gun just about anywhere in Indiana. Bars. Playgrounds. But today, you couldn't carry one downtown to where Trump, Pence, Braun and others addressed the NRA about more goddamn guns. #NRA #2ndAmendment
